data.name: Report.CustomerStatementDesc
data.value: Generate customer statement for a specified period, including delivery, return, and payment details with opening/closing balances

data.name: Report.CustomerSalesAnalysisDesc
data.value: Ranked by sales amount, analyzes customer sales share and ranking

data.name: Report.CustomerTransactionDesc
data.value: Query customer delivery and return transaction records grouped by customer

data.name: Report.CustomerRosterDesc
data.value: Print customer basic data list including customer code, company name, contact person, tax ID, phone, and address

data.name: Report.CustomerDetailDesc
data.value: Print complete customer details including contact info, payment terms, and sales rep, one block per customer

data.name: Report.CustomerVisitReportDesc
data.value: Print customer visit records including visit date, customer, visitor, purpose, and result summary

data.name: Report.SupplierStatementDesc
data.value: Generate supplier statement for a specified period, including purchase, return, and payment details with opening/closing balances

data.name: Report.SupplierPurchaseAnalysisDesc
data.value: Analyze supplier purchase amounts and trends

data.name: Report.SupplierRosterDesc
data.value: Print supplier basic data list including supplier code, name, contact, tax ID, phone, and address

data.name: Report.SupplierDetailDesc
data.value: Print complete supplier details including contact info, payment terms, and address, one block per supplier

data.name: Report.PurchaseOrderDesc
data.value: Print purchase order including supplier info, product details, and amount summary

data.name: Report.PurchaseReceivingDesc
data.value: Print receiving document including inspection info and warehouse entry details

data.name: Report.PurchaseReturnDesc
data.value: Print purchase return document including return reason and return details

data.name: Report.QuotationDesc
data.value: Print quotation including customer info, product details, and amount summary

data.name: Report.SalesOrderDesc
data.value: Print sales order including customer info, product details, and amount summary

data.name: Report.SalesDeliveryDesc
data.value: Print delivery note including customer info, product details, and amount summary

data.name: Report.SalesReturnDesc
data.value: Print sales return document including return reason and return details

data.name: Report.ProductListDesc
data.value: Print product basic data list including product code, name, specification, barcode, category, and unit

data.name: Report.ProductDetailDesc
data.value: Print complete product details including specification, barcode, category, unit, purchase type, cost, and pricing, one block per product

data.name: Report.BOMReportDesc
data.value: Print product BOM list showing component code, name, quantity, unit, and cost grouped by formula

data.name: Report.ProductionScheduleDesc
data.value: Query production schedules including schedule items, quantity, status, and planned dates

data.name: Report.InventoryStatusDesc
data.value: Query current stock status for each warehouse including available stock, reserved stock, and inventory value

data.name: Report.InventoryTransactionDesc
data.value: Query inventory movement and transaction records

data.name: Report.InventoryCountDesc
data.value: Grouped by stocktake, shows system stock, actual count, and variance amount per product; supports filtering by variance items only

data.name: Report.VehicleListDesc
data.value: Print vehicle basic data list including plate number, vehicle name, model, brand, person in charge, and insurance expiry

data.name: Report.VehicleMaintenanceDesc
data.value: Print vehicle maintenance records including maintenance type, date, mileage, cost, and service shop details

data.name: Report.EmployeeRosterDesc
data.value: Print employee basic data list including employee code, name, department, position, hire date, and employment status

data.name: Report.EmployeeDetailDesc
data.value: Print complete employee details including contact info, emergency contacts, and employment information, one block per employee

data.name: Report.WasteRecordDesc
data.value: Print waste record list grouped by waste type, including plate number, customer, warehouse, weight, and cost details

data.name: Report.AccountsReceivableSetoffDesc
data.value: Print accounts receivable setoff document including customer info, offset details, and payment records

data.name: Report.AccountsPayableSetoffDesc
data.value: Print accounts payable setoff document including supplier info, offset details, and payment records

data.name: Report.AccountItemListDesc
data.value: Print standard chart of accounts grouped by account type, showing account code, name, level, and debit/credit direction

data.name: Report.TrialBalanceDesc
data.value: Summarize debit/credit amounts and cumulative ending balances for each account from posted journal entries, verifying balance

data.name: Report.IncomeStatementDesc
data.value: Summarize operating revenue, cost, and expenses for a specified period, calculating gross profit, operating income, and pre-tax income

data.name: Report.BalanceSheetDesc
data.value: Summarize cumulative balances of assets, liabilities, and equity as of a cutoff date (Assets = Liabilities + Equity)

data.name: Report.GeneralLedgerDesc
data.value: Display account cards for all accounts grouped by account type, each showing all posted journal entry details with opening balance, running balance, and closing balance

data.name: Report.SubsidiaryLedgerDesc
data.value: Query specific account cards by account code/name keyword, showing posted journal entry details and running balance, suitable for accounts receivable/payable by customer/supplier

data.name: Report.DetailAccountBalanceDesc
data.value: Summarize opening balance, period debit/credit amounts, and closing balance for each account without transaction details, for quick review of balance changes
